name: Double Barrel Dungeon Crawler
description:
Fight your way through various creatures that try and stop your path. Find keys to unlock doors as well as escape the reality you are in. Run, Fight, Don't be afraid. 

What to find: You find yourself at the bottom of the dungeon, you are left alone with nothing but your weapon. The plan for you now is to locate yourself around the map finding various upgrades and fight your way through the dungeon to locate a key and escape this nightmare. 

Controls: 

-WASD to move around the map. 

- Left click too fire your weapon, right to ADS

-R to reload
